name: Pixel assault
description:
Hi, my name is "Cesar Forthomme", and this is my Game: "Pixel Assault".

If you have any questions or encounter any issue regarding the games preformance and or  features, please let me know directly at cesarforthomme@gmail.com 

Music volume can be changed inside the game settings.

NOTICE!

There seems to be some issues when trying to play the game on Mac devices. Unfortunately I can't access Mac devices for the moment, making it difficult to diagnose and resolve.  

If an error occurs, reload the page and try again.
